description:
One day, Misaki accidentally dropped her glasses into the water and Pochama retrieved them for her. From that day on, they became partners.
Misaki`s Piplup swam from Kissaki City in the Sinnoh Region all the way to Kuchiba City in the Kanto Region because it was mad with Misaki giving more affection and attention to Gureggru than it.
It competed in an Ice Floe Race in the Sinnoh Region where it almost won the race except Rocket Gang interfered and it had to help save Misaki from falling off the boat into the sea.
name: Pochama (Misaki)
